channel.title: android on Home
channel.description: Recent content in android on Home

item.title: Ethical Hacking - Mobile Devices and Platforms - notes
item.description: Good sources of knowledge: OWASP Testing guide - book OWASP Pinning cheat sheet Android Application Executes as: application service Helpers Broadcast receiver (allows app to register for specifi events which will be then passed to it for action) content provider (it interfaces between app and file storage and provide sql-like interface to read/write/modify/delete data). SQLite is a common DB service access via content provider.
